info.name: Alexis
info.about: Third year student at the University of Kansas majoring in Computer Science, lover of all things art and makeup, aspiring traveller.

experiences.name: MLH Fellowship
experiences.description: 12-week internship where participants collaborate on real open source projects with engineers from top companies

experiences.name: 2022 Target Women in Tech Symposium
experiences.description: 4-day symposium where participants attended a variety of differnet presentations by senior-level engineers, were given a tour of Target Tech innovation, and participated in a hackathon

experiences.name: Research Assistant - KSU
experiences.description: Worked as a research assistant to Dr. Eugene Vasserman at KSU, managed data in Excel, ran experiments on Information Security

hobbies.name: Flute
hobbies.description: I have been classically trained in flute for 14 years, and continue to train and play in ensembles, as well as teach lessons

hobbies.name: Makeup
hobbies.description: I picked up makeup as a de-stressor hobby my third year of high school, and since then have turned it into a small business to do others' makeup for events

hobbies.name: Running a study instagram
hobbies.description: My friends convinced me to start a study instagram to post my notes because, for some reason, they (and everyone else) really love my handwriting
